check_my_result_lose:
I couldn't guess the word.
${emoji}
Can you do it?

You can download the game here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.carapacik.wordly
check_my_result_win:
The word is solved in ${attemptNumber}/6 attempts
${emoji}?
${emoji}
Can you repeat my result?

You can download the game here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.carapacik.wordly
contact:
If you didn't find a word in the dictionary,
write to us, we will add it
in the next update.
letter_correct: Letter exists and is in correct spot
text_copied: The text is copied to the clipboard
